title: debit cards
extract: A debit card allows you to make purchases from stores and withdrawals from ATMs which get debited from your bank account. Some people call these cards EFTPOS or ATM cards. Another option available from banks and credit unions is a Visa Debit or MasterCard Debit card.
extract_html: A debit card allows you to make purchases from stores and withdrawals from ATMs which get debited from your bank account. Some people call these cards EFTPOS or ATM cards. Another option available from banks and credit unions is a Visa Debit or MasterCard Debit card.
